title: Network Engineer (CCNA / CCNP)
full_description: TekCom Resources is currently recruiting for Network Engineer (CCNA / CCNP) to work in a Telecom environment (broadband).   These are Full-time positions where you assist in the development and maintenance of an OSI Layers 1-4 network plan for our clients customers.  Role: Design, implementation, troubleshooting and administration of network builds of client customer's builds   Network support includes utilizing the trouble ticket system for configuration changes, adding new services, or network redesigns and broadband networks.   Key Skills: CCNA / CCNP, Cisco certified,Telecom, broadband, ISP, Network Engineering, FTTX, Adtran, Juniper , Architecture, OSI Layers 1-4, Configuration Routers, Cisco routers and switches (IOS, IOS XE, IOS XR, Catalyst, and Nexus (NX-OS), Juniper, Adtran, BGP design and control (route-maps (IOS), RPLs (IOS XR), WAN traffic balancing design (BGP), VLANs, trunks, LACP, and vPC, static routing, dynamic routing, ACLs, and NAT   TekCom Resources, Inc. is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer and values diversity. All employment is decided on the basis of qualifications, merit and business need. We are compliant with the Fair Chance Ordinance as applicable, and will consider all qualified applications for employment.
